feed.title: NocoDB Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for NocoDB: 0.260.5: Bug Fix Release
entry.content:
ğŸ› Closed Issues

  • [closed] ğŸ› Bug: DATESTR function is not available for your database #10377
  • [closed] ğŸ› Bug: Data deletion bug when filtering and selecting all records #10375
  • [closed] ğŸ› Bug: Trying to edit any field in kanban view causes cursor to move into date field. #10374
  • [closed] ğŸ› Bug: NocoDB not starting after update to latest version #10355
  • [closed] ğŸ› Bug: lookup field are limited to 25 ! #10354
  • [closed] ğŸ› Bug: hash mismatch in Nix build #10339
  • [closed] ğŸ”¦ Feature: MySQL as ExtSource- Allow using text instead of set when using select fields #10338
  • [closed] ğŸ› Bug: Deserialization Error on Minio plugin - fresh upstall #10332
  • [closed] Free Vulnerability Code Review for Your GitHub Repository #10327
  • [closed] ğŸ› Bug: Installation script fails to retrieve external IP address due to HTML response from ifconfig.co #10320
  • [closed] ğŸ› Bug: Rename table #10313
  • [closed] ğŸ”¦ Feature: Option to Enable Paginated View #10292
  • [closed] ğŸ› Bug: Cannot read properties of undefined (reading 'findIndex') - error updating a linked field in the kanban view #10283
  • [closed] ğŸ› Bug: Webhook is sent out of date. #10281
  • [closed] ğŸ› Bug: Disorder in hidden fields on kanban cards. #10276
  • [closed] ğŸ› Bug: Meta sync not working for postgres db integration #10255
  • [closed] ğŸ› Bug: Link field API response issue #10222
  • [closed] ğŸ› Bug: Can't use "field summary" in a "group by" view #10221
  • [closed] cannot create source via api #10178
  • [closed] ğŸ”¦ Feature: Roll-up sum of formula #10144
  • [ğŸ› Type: Bug] ğŸ› Bug: Cannot use OVH S3 Plugin: "Invalid Region: region was not a valid dns name" #9942
  • [ğŸ› Type: Bug] ğŸ› Bug: Question mark isn't automatically escaped in REGEX_EXTRACT #9847
  • [ğŸ› Type: Bug][Status: Reproducible] ğŸ› Bug: Formula to linked formula which is primary #9812
  • [ğŸ› Type: Bug] ğŸ› Bug: Delete Webhook Payload only visible Columns #9778
  • [ğŸ› Type: Bug] ğŸ› Bug: Webhook doesnt fire when a relation gets updated #9763
  • [ğŸ› Type: Bug] ğŸ› Bug: TypeError: Cannot read properties of null (reading 'date_format') while update external PG table #9731
  • [ğŸ”¦ Type: Feature] ğŸ”¦ Feature: Support the import of CSV files with non-UTF-8 encodings. #9634
  • [ğŸ› Type: Bug] ğŸ› Bug: difference between time field is in JSON format #9511
  • [ğŸ› Type: Bug] ğŸ› Bug: "T is not iterable" when trying to delete records #9307
  • [ğŸ”¦ Type: Feature] ğŸ”¦ Feature: Introduce Bulk Delete button for attachment fields #9282
  • [ğŸ”¦ Type: Feature] ğŸ”¦ Feature: record audit logs as date and time instead of "days and hours ago" #9106
  • [ğŸ”¦ Type: Feature] ğŸ”¦ Feature: Inquiry about the completeness and openness of the nc-help library #9012
  • [Status: Reproducible] ğŸ› Bug: Many-to-many relationships are not deleted when deleting a record #8366
  • [closed] ğŸ”¦ Feature: Adding rows in middle of the table #8196
  • [ğŸ” Status: More Info Needed] ğŸ› Bug: copy record url in detail view not working #7117
  • [ğŸ‘‹ For : Community or Good First Issue] Doesn't create relations from Postgresql DB #719
  • [closed] ğŸ”¦ Feature: Button open url with dynamic url based on attachment field #10419
  • [closed] ğŸ› Bug: Drag Indicator in Single-Select and Multi-Select is scrambled #10409
  • [closed] ğŸ› Bug: Editor shouldn't be able to modify form schema #10360
  • [closed] ğŸ› Bug: Cannot HEAD /dashboard #10337
  • [closed] ğŸ› Bug: Minio endpoint name can't have underscore #10334
  • [Status: Reproducible] ğŸ› Bug: Column name changes after using SingleSelect #8606
  • [closed] ğŸ› Bug: csv upload into field set to duration fails #8358
  • [closed] ğŸ”¦ Feature: Allow rollup also for linked formula fields #7975
  • [ğŸ“ Status: Need Internal Discussion] ğŸ”¦ Feature: Enable LTAR #7053
  • [ğŸ”¦ Type: Feature] ğŸ”¦ Feature: Allow using values from has-many child tables in webhooks #4481
  • [âœ¨ Type: Enhancement][ğŸ”¦ Type: Feature][ğŸ° Scope : Column] [Feature] Use Formula result in Rollup #3014
  • [âœ¨ Type: Enhancement][ğŸ”¦ Type: Feature][ğŸ° Scope : Column] [Feature] Use rollup in formula #1331
  • [ğŸ› Type: Bug] ğŸ› [Import CSV] Bug: Script error : "cannot read properties of undefined" when using pagination #1297
  • [ğŸ”¦ Type: Feature][ğŸš˜ Scope : Automation] Feature : log automations #313

What's Changed

  • Release 0.260.3 by @github-actions in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10396
  • chore: post-release sync by @github-actions in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10397
  • Update runner os to ubuntu-22.04 by @pranavxc in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10399
  • chore: Update runner os to ubuntu-22.04 by @pranavxc in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10400
  • 0.260.4 Pre-release by @github-actions in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10401
  • Release 0.260.4 by @github-actions in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10402
  • chore: post-release sync by @github-actions in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10403
  • chore(github/workflow/bumper): switch to the new nix runner by @sinanmohd in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10405
  • chore(github/workflow/bumper): fixes by @sinanmohd in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10408
  • fix: Add help text for hostname error in Minio by @pranavxc in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10412
  • Nc hook logs by @dstala in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10404
  • fix: avoid lazy loading of typeable editor cell component by @dstala in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10416
  • fix: mask creds on get by @mertmit in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10361
  • New Crowdin updates by @o1lab in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10413
  • Nc data audit enable by @dstala in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10426
  • New Crowdin updates by @o1lab in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10427
  • fix: Include foreign key if system fields is enabled at view level by @pranavxc in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10414
  • fix: support japanese, chinese and cryillic letters by @fendy3002 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10428
  • fix : escape parentheses on filter from API by @fendy3002 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10415
  • 0.260.5 Pre-release by @github-actions in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10430

Full Changelog: https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/compare/0.260.3...0.260.5

entry.title: New release for NocoDB: 0.260.6: Bug Fix Release
entry.content:
ğŸ› Closed Issues

  • [closed] ğŸ› Bug: Filter by date not working after update to 0.260.5 #10447
  • [closed] ğŸ”¦ Feature: realtime updating #10440
  • [closed] ğŸ› Bug: cannot use search by fields with Russian names #10439
  • [closed] ğŸ› Bug: null doesn't work #10438
  • [closed] ğŸ› Bug: Trying to edit any field in kanban view causes cursor to move into date field #10424
  • [ğŸ› Type: Bug] ğŸ› Bug: log in page of app.nocodb.com is blank #9552

What's Changed

  • Release 0.260.5 by @github-actions in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10431
  • chore: post-release sync by @github-actions in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10432
  • fix internationalization by @pranavxc in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10434
  • fix: Add whitespace support in where query param parser by @pranavxc in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10436
  • fix (nocodb-sdk): Handle suboperator on logical level, more language support by @pranavxc in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10441
  • fix: attachment null by @mertmit in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10444
  • fix: condition for attachment check by @mertmit in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10446
  • Nc fix/date filter bug by @pranavxc in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10445
  • chore: bump package versions by @mertmit in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10437
  • Nc fix/progress meta sync by @dstala in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10448
  • New Crowdin updates by @o1lab in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10450
  • fix: cache calculated value by @mertmit in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10455
  • fix: rollback the query filter to previous implementation by @pranavxc in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10454
  • 0.260.6 Pre-release by @github-actions in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10456

Full Changelog: https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/compare/0.260.5...0.260.6

entry.title: New release for NocoDB: 0.260.7: Bug Fix Release
entry.content:
ğŸ› Closed Issues

  • [closed] ğŸ› Bug: API updates are altering records not included in the payload. #10473
  • [closed] ğŸ› Bug: limit Parameter Ignored in REST API #10435
  • [closed] Bug: Rollup a formula field #10429
  • [ğŸ› Type: Bug] ğŸ› Bug: Formula that evaluates to boolean #9815
  • [closed] ğŸ”¦ Feature: Private minio cannot be used to download attachments #9590

What's Changed

  • fix: worker monaco by @mertmit in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10462
  • fix: Bulk update - order record list same as input data by @pranavxc in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10476
  • fix: send table alias for rollup when column is formula by @fendy3002 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10478
  • fix (nc-gui): false readonly checkbox still show empty square by @fendy3002 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10468
  • refactor: add unsynced changes from ee by @fendy3002 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10486
  • fix: broken is requested logic by @mertmit in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10472

Full Changelog: https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/compare/0.260.6...0.260.7

entry.title: New release for NocoDB: 0.262.0: NocoDB Grid 2.0 â€“ Built for Speed, Even on Old Windows & Raspberry Pi!!
entry.content:
ğŸš€ NocoDB : Feature Release

We heard you! Performance was a challenge, especially on older Windows systems and browsers. So, we completely rebuilt the NocoDB grid for an ultra-fast, seamless experienceâ€”even on Raspberry Pi setups.

Whatâ€™s Changed?

  • :rocket: Rebuilt from the ground up â€“ Say goodbye to sluggish interactions.
  • ğŸ–¼ï¸ Canvas-powered rendering â€“ No bloat, just pure speed.
  • :dash: Ultra-smooth on old Windows machines â€“ Performance that just works.
  • :strawberry: Runs even on Raspberry Pi â€“ Handle data anywhere, with no slowdowns.
  • :zap: Weâ€™re making NocoDB faster, leaner, and future-readyâ€”so you can work without limits!

This is just the beginning of our performance journey. Try it out and experience the smoothest NocoDB grid yet! :rocket:

ğŸ› Closed Issues

  • [closed] ğŸ› Bug: Excel import error - Parameter 1 is not of type 'Blob' #10499
  • [closed] ğŸ› Bug: Since NocoDB Version 0.260 attachment in mp3 format not playable #10492
  • [closed] ğŸ› Bug: Geo data input NOT work from 0.260.6 #10487
  • [closed] ğŸ› Bug: Unable To Re-Order Image Attachments: Results In Error "Field To Parse Image Data". #10483
  • [closed] ğŸ”¦ Feature: Search across all fields #10463
  • [trigger-CI] ğŸ› Bug: Broken REST API in Russian language #10433
  • [closed] ğŸ› Bug: Lookup field creation via fields menu fails #10423
  • [closed] ğŸ› Bug: Invalid Email throws error when validation enabled #10422
  • [closed] ğŸ› Bug: Cannot scroll through base views on touchscreen devices, it reorders views instead #10346
  • [closed] ğŸ› Bug: In firefox, scrolling vertically in a record view is not available #10319
  • [closed] ğŸ› Bug: Fist field in new table (Title) is not editable #10548
  • [closed] missing projects after changing redis to valkey #10530
  • [closed] ğŸ› Bug: Alt + Left Arrow Shortcut Causes Data Loss #10513
  • [closed] ğŸ› Bug: Excel import error - Parameter 1 is not of type 'Blob' #10499
  • [closed] ğŸ› Bug: Since NocoDB Version 0.260 attachment in mp3 format not playable #10492
  • [closed] ğŸ› Bug: Geo data input NOT work from 0.260.6 #10487
  • [closed] ğŸ› Bug: Unable To Re-Order Image Attachments: Results In Error "Field To Parse Image Data". #10483
  • [closed] ğŸ› Bug: No auto attribution of columns if special characters when importing from file #10482
  • [closed] ğŸ› Bug: Cards with blocked movement in kanban view (when the view mode is locked) #10481
  • [closed] ğŸ”¦ Feature: Search across all fields #10463
  • [trigger-CI] ğŸ› Bug: Broken REST API in Russian language #10433
  • [closed] ğŸ› Bug: Lookup field creation via fields menu fails #10423
  • [closed] ğŸ› Bug: Invalid Email throws error when validation enabled #10422
  • [closed] ğŸ› Bug: Cannot scroll through base views on touchscreen devices, it reorders views instead #10346
  • [closed] ğŸ› Bug: In firefox, scrolling vertically in a record view is not available #10319

What's Changed

  • fix: port in use on code change by @mertmit in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10507
  • Nc fix/image attachment reordering by @dstala in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10493
  • make entire square clickable treat mp3 as video by @dstala in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10501
  • can move cards if view is locked by @dstala in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10510
  • make the video player has auto height instead of 100% by @dstala in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10508
  • fix (nc-gui): fix url import and json string import by @fendy3002 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10503
  • chore: sync import ft by @mertmit in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10509
  • Nc fix(nc-gui): Lookup field creation via fields menu fails by @rameshmane7218 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10512
  • feat: add query based filter support in view url by @dstala in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10511
  • feat: cloud exp by @mertmit in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10504
  • Nc feat/auto add select option by @dstala in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10517
  • refactor: add type definitions to formula query builders by @fendy3002 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10479
  • chore: sync various by @mertmit in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10519
  • feat: Improved Grid View by @DarkPhoenix2704 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10520
  • fix: feature preview height to be same as toolbar by @rameshmane7218 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10522
  • fix: block api token access to meta-diff by @dstala in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10480
  • fix: square bracket rich text by @mertmit in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10526
  • Nc fix(nc-gui): disable draggable/sortable component reordering in touch based devices by @rameshmane7218 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10505
  • Nc fix/rich perf by @dstala in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10528
  • feat: optimize number of api calls by @mertmit in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10525
  • fix(nc-gui): instead of rendering multiple lookup attachment cell render only 1 by @rameshmane7218 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10518
  • fix(nc-gui): expand row issue in canvas by @rameshmane7218 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10535
  • docs: update comments for coming soon items by @dstala in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10537
  • feat: enable canvas for mobile mode by @DarkPhoenix2704 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10536
  • fix: edit interaction for url, date and attachment by @dstala in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10539
  • Nc feat/canvas formula url by @AmitJoki in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10541
  • fix(nc-gui): disable expanded form keyboard navigation if any input is active/focused by @rameshmane7218 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10551
  • Nc canvas fixes 2 by @dstala in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10545
  • fix: mouseup listener not working properly by @rameshmane7218 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10552
  • fix: canvas related issues by @mertmit in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10538

Full Changelog: https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/compare/0.260.7...0.262.0

entry.title: New release for NocoDB: 0.262.1: Bug Fix Release
entry.content:
ğŸ› Closed Issues

  • [closed] ğŸ› Bug: Disorder in the record creation card within a related field. #10631
  • [closed] ğŸ› Bug: Description popup disabled. #10630
  • [closed] ğŸ› Bug: Upload CSV should skip system fields #10617
  • [closed] ğŸ› Bug: Can't copy past value to "many-to-many" field #10613
  • [Status: Reproducible] ğŸ› Bug: Form View with Attachment and Links Field, entry triggers "Failed to load list" #10608
  • [closed] ğŸ”¦ Feature: Increase file upload size to 512MB to support big files #10595
  • [Status: Reproducible] ğŸ› Bug: String to currency transformation is broken #10593
  • [closed] ğŸ› Bug: The import date field doesn't respect the chosen format for all dates #10584
  • [Status: Reproducible] ğŸ› Bug: commenter role, checkbox data is not displayed #10581
  • [closed] ğŸ› Bug: Gridview 2.0 has reversed columns in Firefox (v135) #10577
  • [closed] ğŸ”¦ Feature: Clean S3 object when we remove attachment from a row #10575
  • [closed] ğŸ”¦ Feature: export a base #10574
  • [closed] ğŸ”¦ Feature: Dark Mode #10573
  • [closed] ğŸ› Bug: Paste in MM cell of canvas table throw Maximum call stack error #10571
  • [Status: Reproducible] ğŸ› Bug: Can not paste text to the search box on the right side #10570
  • [closed] ğŸ› Bug: Formula field empty but displayed correctly in the linked field #10567
  • [closed] ğŸ”¦ Feature: Group by Pagination limit #10566
  • [closed] ğŸ› Bug: Upload of .tif not possible #10564
  • [closed] ğŸ› Bug: Shift + scroll is not working on Grid View 2.0 #10560
  • [closed] No Thumbnails shown with docker and nginx SSL reverse proxy #10554
  • [closed] ğŸ”¦ Feature: Enable to click one to one relational records in expanded view #10546
  • [closed] Development Setup - Backend server doesn't start due to sqlite binding issue #10544
  • [closed] ğŸ› Bug: Reorder fields displayed in List Linked Records list #10527
  • [closed] ğŸ› Bug: Values â€‹â€‹in "link type columns" with "one-to-one" and "one-to-many" connections are no longer clickable. #10524
  • [closed] ğŸ”¦ Feature: changes in user management authority #10516
  • [closed] ğŸ› Bug: CSV import -> meta API col to decimal -> filtering still on the STRING basis #10515
  • [closed] ğŸ”¦ Feature: Add duration formatting to formula fields #10506
  • [closed] ğŸ› Bug: CSV import using URL - this.source.map is not a function #10498
  • [closed] Improvement: wider import data modal (web responsive) #10497
  • [closed] Button "Fill Form" is not translated / survey mode #10491
  • [closed] ğŸ› Bug: Click on a linked entry does nothing #10471
  • [closed] ğŸ”¦ Feature: When editing single select and multi-select field options, allow to sort them alphabetically #10461
  • [closed] ğŸ› Bug: Unable to delete form #10295
  • [âœ¨ Type: Enhancement] Feature: Linked Records List are not sorted in the order of records in table #10246
  • [closed] ğŸ”¦ Feature: Table Migration Between Bases #10210
  • [closed] ğŸ› Bug: Slow performance on Grid View (Using 2gb of ram in Chrome) #10194
  • [closed] ğŸ› Bug: NocoDB Cloud Sign In Issue - Cannot resolve 'signin' Error 500 #10120
  • [closed] ğŸ”¦ Feature: On refresh only reload the records shown through filter. #10061
  • [ğŸ”¦ Type: Feature] ğŸ”¦ Feature: AppWrite integration #10020
  • [ğŸ”¦ Type: Feature] ğŸ”¦ Feature: Allow ordering linked records in relationships (e.g., many-to-many) #9916
  • [ğŸ”¦ Type: Feature] ğŸ”¦ Feature: add ArvanCloudS3 to Storage Services #9737
  • [ğŸ› Type: Bug] ğŸ› Bug: Can't add new record if group by is enabled & all records are filtered out #9715
  • [ğŸ”¦ Type: Feature] ğŸ”¦ Feature: be able to allow or deny access to views by user #9711
  • [ğŸ”¦ Type: Feature] ğŸ”¦ Feature: Limit options in form view for "linked records" field #9655
  • [ğŸ› Type: Bug] ğŸ› Bug: can't signin in self-hosted #9568
  • [ğŸ› Type: Bug][Status: Reproducible] ğŸ› Bug: Kanban stacks are expandable in Locked view mode #9554
  • [ğŸ› Type: Bug] ğŸ› Bug: Install worked but cannot find my server. #9507
  • [ğŸ› Type: Bug] ğŸ› Bug: "Sign up for free" as optional / configurable in Shared view #9474
  • [ğŸ› Type: Bug] ğŸ› Bug: Invalid Scope at Migration #9442
  • [ğŸ”¦ Type: Feature] ğŸ”¦ Feature: Ability to develop/extend custom field types #9440
  • [ğŸ› Type: Bug] ğŸ› Bug: PDFs are not getting migrated when airtable migration is happening #9402
  • [ğŸ› Type: Bug] ğŸ› Bug: The plus icon and minus icon clicked Invalid when share base with editing access #9356
  • [ğŸ› Type: Bug] ğŸ› Bug: Content disposition header is not getting applied for certain Storage Plugins #9350
  • [ğŸ› Type: Bug] ğŸ› Bug: Record not found #9345
  • [ğŸ”¦ Type: Feature] ğŸ”¦ Feature: share base with editing access,the relationship fields can also be edited #9336
  • [ğŸ› Type: Bug] ğŸ› Bug: attempting to upgrade docker container nocodb/nocodb:latest fails on migration file "nc_054_id_length" #9315
  • [ğŸ› Type: Bug][Status: Not Reproducible] ğŸ› Bug: placeholder Cover Image is shown even though it is not configured #9296
  • [ğŸ› Type: Bug] ğŸ› Bug: SQLite missing in integrations page #9251
  • [ğŸ”¦ Type: Feature] ğŸ”¦ Feature: Admin panel with support for Email & Storage configuration #9208
  • [ğŸ”¦ Type: Feature] ğŸ”¦ Feature: format and display grid value with custom rules. #9191
  • [ğŸ› Type: Bug] ğŸ› Bug: Duplicate shared base Workspace editor not allowed #9115
  • [ğŸ”¦ Type: Feature] ğŸ”¦ Feature: Ability to change view without sidebar #9111
  • [ğŸ”¦ Type: Feature] ğŸ”¦ Feature: Date quick select by entering digits #9110
  • [ğŸ› Type: Bug] can't query database #9109
  • [ğŸ”¦ Type: Feature] ğŸ”¦ Feature: Supabase Storage - NEW PLUGIN #8999
  • [ğŸ”¦ Type: Feature] [Feature] Add Support for Wasabi #8975
  • [ğŸ› Type: Bug][ğŸ˜ DB : Postgres] ğŸ› Bug: Unable to Recognize Foreign Keys When Connecting as a Regular User #8960
  • [closed] ğŸ”¦ Feature: Automatically add single or multi-select options on import #8911
  • [closed] ğŸ”¦ Feature: Increase limit of single/multi select options to 1000 #8907
  • [closed] ğŸ› Bug: "Duplicate column alias" error with Airtable API quick import #8798
  • [closed] ğŸ› Bug: singleselect import on external postgres #8770
  • [closed] ğŸ› Bug: "Email me" option in form view should work without explicit SMPT configuration in cloud #8700
